DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 2 , randomize , double-blind , parallel group , placebo control , multicenter study investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics activity multiple oral dos GS 9450 adult NASH . Following randomization , subject return within five business day later baseline visit , time dispense study medication enter 4-week treatment phase . Upon completion treatment phase , subject enter 4 week off-treatment follow-up period . Each subject 's participation study last approximately 12 week ( inclusive screening , treatment phase , off-treatment follow-up period ) .
